qas.question: What is the Rose Garden also known as?
What can you see from the Rose Garden?

answers.text: view of the medieval town centre

qas.question: What was the Rosarium converted into?
What year was the Rosarium converted?

context: The Rose Garden (<a0_0>Rosengarten<a0_0/>), from which a scenic panoramic <a1_0>view of the medieval town centre<a1_0/> can be enjoyed, is a well-kept Rosarium on a hill, converted into <a2_0>a park<a2_0/> from a former cemetery in <a3_0>1913<a3_0/>.
